CommonFields.Title: Study on the properties of nano-TiO
Author: Huang, Jintao
Lu, Xiang

CommonFields.Location: National Engineering Research Center of Novel Equipment for Polymer Processing; The Key Laboratory of Polymer Processing Engineering of the Ministry of Education, South China University of Technology; Guangdong Guangzhou 510640 People's Republic of China

FillerComponent.ManufacturerOrSourceName: Xuan Cheng Jing Rui New Material, China

Drying-Evaporation.Description: PBS and TiO2 were dried before blending to remove moisture.

Mixing.Description: PBS, and TiO2 was blended and then added to the vane extruder.

MoldingInfo.Description: The extruded pellets were compression molded in a hydraulic press.

Dynamic_Mechanical_Analysis.Description: DMA was performed at temperatures ranging from -120 to 80 deg C under liquid nitrogen atmosphere. Tests were performed in a single cantilever bending mode at a fixed frequency of 1 Hz and a heating rate of 3 deg C min21.
